text: (chaur changcha) nowpel del a l laoh ban mean bantoul tha ao ai sa. pitabrakd nasa yeung kuchea anak dk yk anak( pi phendei) ning chea anak leuk anak mokkan yeung promteang romdaoh anak aoy ruochphot pi puok brachheang haey yeung nung thveu aoy banda anak del brate b tde tam anak khpangkhpasa cheang puok del brachheang rhautadl thngai barlok . kraoyomk kanleng vilotralb robsa puok anak ku mokkan yeung vinh . haey yeung nung katsechakdei rveang puok anak nouv avei del puok anak thleab khvengkoumnit knea knong rueng noh
